item.title: Need a Hoster!

item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

1. they can leech it(if it's any good)
No chance of it being leeched.
2. they can call the server whatever they wish, so they can use your work and make it their's
Just give them obfuscated compiled files, without the source?
3. he can ban you anytime he wants, and you can never log back on.... o.O
Manage bans etc, properly?

item.title: Need a Hoster!
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

I could host it. 24/7 and this.Rule 1: Before you ask your question, you must check the FAQ’s BEFORE you post your question.
Rule 2: Search the tutorial section for a tutorial before asking for help on how to do something.
Rule 3: There is NO FLAMING at all toward the person asking the question.
Rule 4: No posting multiple topics about the same question. Stick to one topic to get the full answer to your question.
Rule 5: There is no spamming allowed on this forum. If you are caught spamming, your post will be deleted and if you continue it may result in a punishment.
Rule 6: There is no advertising allowed in this forum. If you are caught, you will get your post will be deleted and result also in a punishment, do not post your forum link or server IP on any way.
Rule 7: Do not offer any kind of money, RS cash or whatever to get help.
Rule 8: Stay on topic. If you start posting stuff that would belong in other forums, we will move the topic to where it belongs. If you continue to, we will lock or delete them.
Rule 9: Make sure that you use the search button if you could not find any tutorials or if the FAQs could not answer your question.
Rule 10: IF your topic has ANYTHING to do with MoparScape, please post it in the MoparScape Questions Section. Moparscape related questions are about the Forums, Webclient, Client and status page.
Rule 11: Do not flame spammers or Rule breakers. Instead report them and leave them alone, do not start a spam fest yourself.
Rule 12: NO support threads, this whole section is meant to help, so there is no need for ‘Post your question here’ threads.
Rule 13: Development teams may not be Forum development related. This means you may not post an application form including ‘Forum Admin’ nor ‘Forum mod’, this section is for ServerDevelopment and not forum development.

Read full topic
